meanings.definition: The act of exceeding a limit or boundary.
meanings.sent1: The exceedences of the speed limit led to a hefty fine.
meanings.sent2: The company's profits showed exceedences compared to last year.
meanings.sent3: The race car's exceedences of the track boundaries made the audience gasp.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness knew no exceedences, always going above and beyond.
meanings.sent5: The storm's exceedences of the river banks caused flooding in the town.

meanings.definition: An amount by which something exceeds a limit or expectation.
meanings.sent1: The exceedences in sugar content made the dessert too sweet.
meanings.sent2: The budget had exceedences due to unexpected expenses.
meanings.sent3: The cat's exceedences in catching mice made it the neighborhood hero.
meanings.sent4: His intelligence had exceedences that astounded his classmates.
meanings.sent5: The tree's exceedences in height reached far above the rest of the forest.
